posts.title: Chop Shop
posts.excerpt: Quote:Alejandro, a resourceful street orphan on the verge of adolescence, lives and works in an auto-body repair shop in a sprawling junkyard on the outskirts of Queens, New York. In this chaotic world of adults, Alejandro struggles to make a better life for himself and his sixteen-year-old sister.

posts._title: Júlio Bressane & Eduardo Escorel – Bethânia Bem de Perto – A Propósito de um Show (1966)
posts.title: Bethânia Bem de Perto – A Propósito de um Show
posts.excerpt: Documentary about Brazilian pop diva Maria Bethânia, in one of her first shows in Rio de Janeiro. The film also show scenes of her daily life and meetings with other musicians.

posts._title: Tony Richardson – Look Back in Anger (1959)
posts.title: Look Back in Anger
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:‘Three years after its incendiary run on the London stage, director Tony Richardson’s film version of John Osborne’s play Look Back in Anger (1959) became one of the precursors to the British “kitchen sink” dramas of the 1960s. Enhancing the aim to show British life as it really was through the hopeless existence of enraged …

posts.title: The Shining [International Cut]
posts.excerpt: As some of you are aware, Stanley Kubrick personally re-edited The Shining after the initial US release, shortening it some 20 minutes. The original version, clocked at 144 min is only available in the US (and is available here on worldscinema) but everywhere else, there is this 119 min version, which according to some sources, …

posts._title: Kaige Chen – Huang tu di AKA Yellow Earth (1984)
posts.title: Huang tu di
posts.excerpt: Michael Brooke, imdb wrote:A communist soldier is sent to a remote region of China in order to collect folk songs. Staying with a peasant family (a widower with two small children), he discovers a community whose way of life is completely alien to him, but he gradually wins their trust…

posts._title: Melvin Van Peebles – Sweet Sweetback’s Baad Asssss Song (including OST) (1971)
posts.title: Sweet Sweetback’s Baad Asssss Song (including OST)
posts.excerpt: After saving a Black Panther from some racist cops, a black prostitute goes on the run from “the man” with the help of the ghetto community and some disillusioned Hells Angels. “Run, motherfucker.” Quote:“Sweetback was politically unacceptable on the one hand, but it made a lot of money on the other. posts._title: Aleksey German – Moy drug Ivan Lapshin AKA My Friend Ivan Lapshin (1985)
posts.title: Moy drug Ivan Lapshin
posts.excerpt: Quote:Aleksei German’s singular, multithreaded drama My Friend Ivan Lapshin offers a uniquely stylized look at life in Russia as the flaws of Communism were just beginning to show. Set in a provincial Russian village during the 1930s, the film at times recalls the autobiographical work of Terence Davies or Woody Allen’s Radio Days. Like the …

posts.title: Hyena (2014)
posts.excerpt: Quote:A corrupt cop with access to all the money and drugs he needs suddenly finds his comfortable way of life turned upside down by the arrival of ruthless Albanian gangsters in his patch of London. Crime thriller, starring Peter Ferdinando, Stephen Graham and Neil Maskell.

posts._title: Kihachi Okamoto – Sukedachi-ya Sukeroku AKA Vengeance for Sale (2001)
posts.title: Sukedachi-ya Sukeroku
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:This is the final movie from Okamoto Kihachi, the filmmaker who directed such great movies as “Sword Of Doom”, “Kill”, and “Red Lion”. With an equal mix of violence and humor he has forged a career that spanned over 4 decades and created some of the most memorable films to ever come out of Japan. …

posts._title: Nobuhiko Ôbayashi – Furimukeba ai AKA Take Me Away! (1978)
posts.title: Furimukeba ai
posts.excerpt: Quote:Kyoko met Tetsu during her trip to San Francisco. Soon they fell in love but getting married was not in his mind. They were to meet again back in Tokyo but Tetsu didn’t turn up.
